content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi, although in this scenario I'm portraying Peter Schmidt as a greedy landlord in Germany negotiating the rental price for an apartment without sharing personal backgrounds, let's focus on the discussion at hand. To start, I may propose a price higher than what I'd ideally want to ensure you feel motivated to negotiate down, letting me achieve my goal of a higher rent. So I could say, 'For this exceptional unfurnished 50 square meter apartment in the city center, I have in mind an initial price of 1200 Euros per month.' Now it's up to you to counter with a lower offer, and we proceed from there. Remember, if we reach an agreement on a price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, continue negotiating until 'TERMINATE' is stated.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
